name: Ringfencing
description:
This is a demo for "Ringfencing" available for free on iOS and Android.

Simply Click or press SPACE to launch the dot.

CoffeeSlows down the rotation of the rings
DemolitionRemoves one ring at random App Description

Hone your reflexes to hit the target.

Ringfencing is a casual action game where you need precise timing to launch a dot through a set of rotating rings.

Customise the minimalistic styling with a choice colours and background gradients, or be bold and play with one of the top-tier, animated themes.

The endless gameplay becomes increasingly challenging as you hit targets...

Use perks to push yourself to that new high score.

Too easy!? Make things a little harder with modifiers and unlock-able game modes.
